companyDescription: Wasco is a recognised leader in pipeline coatings and offshore corrosion protection, supporting the oil & gas, Liquefied Natural Gas (“LNG”), and carbon capture and storage (“CCS”) sectors. Wasco is a regional leader in biomass energy solutions, supplying high-efficiency steam turbines, industrial boilers, and waste-to-energy systems. Wasco delivers agile and integrated Engineering, Procurement and Construction (“EPC”) and modular fabrication solutions tailored to the needs of the global energy sector.
